amendment.description: Amendment sought to exclude any project with a pending permit application from the new approval requirements in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in part B of House Report 113-492 to exclude any project with a pending permit application from the new approval requirements in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 240 (Roll no. 351).
